column4: I have a laptop lenovo y500 and I installed ubuntu 9.10 but now problem is that sound is not proper, there is a sound but its like a noisy sound no clear sound from laptop speakers
that's crazy, maybe speaker is blown, is it brand new.  Sound usually works no problem.  Maybe it gets muted is the worst thing that could happen
nah in external speakers sounds work fine but for internal speakers its giving problem
oh, so I was right, your speakers are blown.  You bought it used?
